Name: MAGICAL ANGEL FAIRY HEART
About the game: A horde of unknown monsters appeared in the city. FAIRY HEART is on a sortie to save the city. ★ Use a variety of skills to subdue your enemies. If you fail the mission, you can see the HCG animation. ★ Key C: Jump Z: Attack Z Hit ↑ : Jump Attack Space Bar: Special Attack Grab + C + Z: German Suplex Grab +↓↓+ Z: Special Attack X: Dot Laser Beam Attack ★note: Be Sure to Test Play In the Trial Version
